properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 9 at 10:47PM PST until January 11 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow intensity increasing Friday afternoon and night.  Snow showers
will linger through Saturday.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to
10 in the valleys and 1 to 2 feet in the mountains.

* WHERE...Colville, Northport, Deer Park, Chewelah, Newport,
Kettle Falls, Springdale-Hunters Road, Orin-Rice Road, Flowery
Trail Road, Republic, Inchelium, Wauconda, Chesaw Road,
Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Boulder Creek Road, and Sherman
Pass.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 6 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM PST SATURDAY
